paragraphs.heading: Overview
paragraphs.text: Battle Showdown is Ethlas' top of the line multiplayer game. It is a 2D multiplayer shooter game where up to 8 players compete against each other in a free for all or team battles. There is a vast number of characters to choose from and each character has a unique ability. It also includes some NFT characters provided to the game by Ethlas's ReadyNFT.

paragraphs.heading: Okay, but what's included in the game?
paragraphs.text: Oh boy, what to tell you about the features. This games includes a lot of things. From varying cosmetic options where you can put on a cloak of fire, or have a flying yak follow you around to actually having a chance to get your own NFT character in-game, this game is packed with content! Here are some of the interesting features:
list: A vast number of characters to choose from
NFT characters provided by Ethlas's ReadyNFT
A lot of maps to play on
Multiple gamemodes to play, including a custom game mode where you can play with your friends

paragraphs.heading: What did I work on?
paragraphs.text: So what did I do? Well, I did a lot of things. I was responsible for the revamping of the game architecture from a legacy codebase to a new one. I designed complex systems including the first-time user, cosmetics system, backend on Firebase and a bunch of other things, too! Not only that, I also revamped the entire UI of the game after the revamp of the code.
